ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool is sent on a mission with a class of Taskmaster's. They are sent into space where Deadpool and his crew will be stabbed in the back by Titania, Deadpool's roommate; which he knows abotu but still doesn't go with it and messes everything up for everyone.
